w:r.w:t: HR Agent Bot ‚Äì Critical Test Cases & Expected Bot Responses
User Input ‚Üí Expected Bot Response Mapping
"I want to apply for casual leave tomorrow."
Recognizes leave intent, parses leave type (casual) and date (tomorrow)
üìß Manager approval request has been sent to your manager.
Create Leave_Request__c record with Status = "Pending", Working_Days = 1
‚úâÔ∏è Approval email sent to manager with request details
Test 2: Apply Multi-Day Leave with Correct Date Range
"Apply sick leave from 15th to 17th of this month."
Parses leave type (sick), start date (15th), end date (17th), calculates working days
üìß Your manager will review this request.
Create record: Start_Date = 15-Dec, End_Date = 17-Dec, Working_Days = 3 (excludes weekends if applicable)
Test 3: Apply Leave with Invalid Date Order (End Before Start)
Detects that end date (5th) is earlier than start date (10th)
The end date (5th) cannot be earlier than the start date (10th).
Please provide a valid date range. Example: "Apply leave from 10th to 15th next month."
User must re-enter with correct dates
Test 4: Apply Leave with Insufficient Balance
"Apply 20 days of casual leave starting next Monday."
Retrieves employee's leave balance ‚Üí Casual Leave balance = 5 days remaining
‚ùå Cannot create this leave request. You need 15 more days to cover this request.
2. Choose a different leave type if available
3. Check your leave policy by saying "What is my leave balance?"
NO record created; balance check prevents submission
Test 5: Apply Leave with Overlapping Existing Leave
"I want leave on 20th, and I already have leave that week."
Queries Leave_Request__c for records between 15-Dec to 22-Dec with Status = "Approved" or "Pending"
Found: Leave request LEAVE_1234 (18-Dec to 22-Dec, Approved, Sick Leave)
You already have an approved leave request:
falls within your existing leave. You cannot apply for leave on the same day.
1. Cancel your existing leave and apply new dates
2. Choose different dates that don't overlap
3. Check your existing leave by asking "Show my leave requests"
Test 6: Apply Leave for Past Date
Compares leave date against today's date
Cannot apply leave for past dates.
‚ùå Leave cannot be applied retroactively. Only current and future dates are allowed.
Would you like to apply for today or a future date instead?
If retroactive leave is allowed per policy, bot should clarify with manager approval needed
Create record: Is_Half_Day = true, Time_Slot = "Afternoon", Working_Days = 0.5
Employee's leave balance reduced by 0.5 days
Searches for Leave_Request__c records with dates 15-17 Dec, Status = "Pending" or "Approved"
Are you sure you want to cancel this request?
üìß Your manager has been notified of the cancellation.
Notification sent: "Employee has cancelled leave request LEAVE_1234"
Test 9: Edit Leave Request Before Approval
"What would you like to edit: the type, date, reason, or duration?"
üìß Approval request sent to your manager.
Test 10: Manager Cannot Approve Own Leave
"Approve my leave request for next week."
Detects user is trying to approve their own leave
For compliance and policy reasons, employees cannot approve their own leave requests.
Your leave request has been sent to your manager:
Your manager will review and approve/reject it.
You can check the status by asking "What is my leave status?"
"How many casual leave days do I have left?"
Casual_Leave_Balance = 5 days, Sick_Leave_Balance = 8 days, Annual_Leave_Balance = 15 days
Balances are updated in real-time and reflect approved/pending leave deductions.
Would you like to apply for leave? Say "Apply leave" to get started.
Balance reflects live data from Salesforce
"What is the rule for carrying forward unused leave?"
Retrieves from Leave_Policy__c document or knowledge base
Carry-Forward Limit = 5 days, Expiry Date = March 31
‚Ä¢ Maximum days that can be carried forward:
If you have 8 days remaining on March 31, you can carry forward 5 days. The remaining 3 days will be lost.
You can encash unused leaves above 15 days at the end of the financial year.
Need more help? Ask "Apply leave" to submit a request.
Policy information pulled from official Leave_Policy__c record
"I want to work from home tomorrow."
üìß Your manager will review this request.
Create Leave_Request__c record with Type = "WFH", Status = "Pending"
Test 14: Apply Multi-Day WFH Exceeding Monthly Limit
"Book WFH for all days next week."
Checks WFH policy: Max 3 days/week, Max 12 days/month
This month: 1 WFH day used, Remaining: 11 days
Next week = 5 working days (Mon-Fri), but policy allows max 3/week
Policy allows: Maximum 3 days per week
[‚úÖ Approve 3 Days] [‚úèÔ∏è Choose Different Dates] [‚ùå Cancel]
Create 3 separate WFH records for consecutive days
Test 15: Block WFH on Company Holiday
Cannot apply WFH on company holiday.
On company holidays, no work is expected. You cannot apply WFH on this day.
Would you like to choose different dates?
Test 16: WFH on Day with Approved Leave
"Apply WFH on 10th, I already have approved leave that day."
Queries Leave_Request__c for 10th with Status = "Approved" ‚Üí Found: LEAVE_5555 (Approved, Sick Leave)
Conflict detected: Cannot apply WFH on leave day.
You already have an approved leave request on 10-Dec-2025:
You cannot apply WFH on a day you have leave. Please choose a different date.
2. Choose a different date for WFH
3. Check your requests by asking "Show my leave requests"
System prevents WFH + Leave on same day
Test 17: Check WFH Usage This Month
"How many WFH days have I used this month?"
Queries all WFH records for current month with Status = "Approved"
Would you like to apply for more WFH? Say "Apply WFH" to get started.
"Claim reimbursement of 1500 rupees for cab travel yesterday."
Detects reimbursement intent, amount (1500), category (travel), date (yesterday)
I found the following in your request:
‚Äì Upload file or provide reference number (e.g., "INV-ABC123")
‚Äì (Optional) e.g., "Cab to airport for business meeting"
Example: "Receipt number TRAVEL-001, cab to client meeting"
üìß HR will review your claim within 5 business days.
You can check status anytime by asking "Check my reimbursement status."
Amount checked against company limit (if applicable)
"What are the official holidays this month?"
Holiday dates may vary by location. Confirm with your office for location-specific holidays.
Need to apply for leave around these dates? Say "Apply leave" to get started.
Test 20: Explain WFH Policy in Simple Words
"Explain the WFH policy in simple words."
How many WFH days are allowed?
‚ùå NOT on days you already have approved leave
‚ùå NOT on mandatory office days (if any)
‚Ä¢ "How many WFH days do I have left?"
[ ] Check Leave_Policy__c and WFH_Policy__c documents are accessible
[ ] Note any variations from expected response
[ ] Log timestamp and duration for each test
[ ] Document any bot errors or crashes
